        ExportHoverFill:                    ColorFade(cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color1, 20%),
        ExportHoverBorderColor:             cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color1,
        ExportPressedColor:                 cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color1Text,
        ExportPressedFill:                  ColorFade(cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color1, -20%),
        ExportPressedBorderColor:           ColorFade(cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color1, -40%),

        ChartLegendColor:                   cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.defaultTextColor,
        ChartLegendFont:                    cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Font,

        /////////////////
        //
        // Gallery Items
        //
        GalleryFill:                        RGBA(0,0,0,0),
        GalleryBorderColor:                 cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color2,
        //
        // Gallery Title and Subtitle
        //
        GallerytitleLabelColor:             cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color3,
        GallerysubtitleLabelColor:          cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.defaultTextColor,
        GallerytitleLabelFont:              cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Font,
        GallerysubtitleLabelFont:           cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Font,
        //
        // Body content label in Flexible Height Gallery
        //
        GallerycontentLabelColor:           cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.defaultTextColor,
        GallerycontentLabelFont:            cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Font,
        //
        /////////////////

        /////////////////
        //
        // Icons
        //
        // This will apply to all icons
        // (excluding new screen icons used as BGs)
        //
        // IconFill is also used for the background shape of
        // the New Screen headers in: List
        //
        IconFill:                           cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color3,
        IconHoverFill:                      cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color3Text,
        IconPressedFill:                    cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color1,
        // Background set to transparent by default to preserve New Screen-based icons
        IconBackground:                     Transparent,
        IconHoverBackground:                Transparent,
        IconPressedBackground:              Transparent,
        IconBorderColor:                    ColorFade(cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color3, -20%),
        IconHoverBorderColor:               cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color3,
        IconPressedBorderColor:             ColorFade(cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color3, -40%),
        

        AttachmentTextColor:                cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color1Text,
        AttachmentFill:                     cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color1,
        AttachmentBorderColor:              cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color2,
        AttachmentHoverColor:               ColorFade(cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color1Text, 20%),
        AttachmentHoverFill:                ColorFade(cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color1, 20%),
        AttachmentHoverBorderColor:         ColorFade(cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color2, 20%),
        AttachmentFont:                     cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Font,
        AttachmentPressedColor:             cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color2Text,
        AttachmentPressedFill:              cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color2,
        AttachmentItemColor:                cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color3Text,
        AttachmentItemFill:                 cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color3,
        AttachmentItemHoverColor:           ColorFade(cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color3Text, 20%),
        AttachmentItemHoverFill:            ColorFade(cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color3, 20%),

        /////////////////
        //
        // Forms
        //
        EditFormBorderColor:                cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color2,
        EditFormFill:                       If( 
                                                cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.DarkMode,
                                                ColorFade(cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color1, -50%),
                                                ColorFade(cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color1, 50%)
                                            ),
        ViewFormBorderColor:                cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color2,
        ViewFormFill:                       If(
                                                cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.DarkMode,
                                                ColorFade(cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color1, -50%),
                                                ColorFade(cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color1, 50%)
                                            ),
        // Form Title and * fields
        FormTitleLabelColor:                cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color3,
        FormTitleLabelFont:                 cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Font,

        /////////////////
        //
        // Screen
        //
        ScreenBackground:                   If( 
                                                cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.DarkMode,
                                                ColorFade(cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color1, -50%),
                                                ColorFade(cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color1, 50%)
                                            ),

        /////////////////
        //
        // Data Table
        //
        //
        // NotUsed
           DataTableColor1:                    cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color1,
           DataTableColor2:                    cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color2,
        // Border Lines between headers
        DataTableColor3:                    cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color3,
        //
        DataTableColor:                     cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color1Text,
        DataTableFill:                      cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color1,
        DataTableColorInverted:             cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color3Text,
        DataTableSelectedColor:             cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color3Text,
        DataTableSelectedFill:              cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color3,
        DataTableHoverColor:                cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color2Text,
        DataTableHoverFill:                 cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color2,
        DataTableBorderColor:               cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color2,
        DataTableInputFill:                 cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color1,
        DataTableFont:                      cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Font,
        DataTableHeadingFont:               cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Font,
        DataTableHeadingColor:              cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color2Text,
        DataTableHeadingFill:               cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color2,
        DataTableFontWeight:                FontWeight.Normal,
        DataTableHeadingFontWeight:         FontWeight.Semibold,

        /////////////////
        //
        // PDFViewer & PowerBI
        //
        PdfViewerFill:                      ColorFade(cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color1, -50%),
        PdfViewerBorderColor:               cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color2,
        PowerBIBorderColor:                 cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color2,
        
        //////////////////////////////////////////////////
        //                                              //
        //  These apply to the Insert>New Screen items  //
        //                                              //
        //////////////////////////////////////////////////
        //
        // Title Label on New Screen Headers
        //
        invertedBkgHeaderLabelColor:        cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color2Text,
        //
        // New Screen Header background shape for:
        // Scrollable, Email, People, Meeting,
        // 
        // also selected tab shape colour on Meeting screen
        // see: IconFill also used for other new screen header shapes
        //
        IconFillInverted:                   cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color2,
        //
        // Label on Success Screen, Tutorial Screen
        // To / Subject / Message Title on Email screen
        // SubTitle label on PeopleBrowseGallery on Email Screen
        // Attendees/Subject/Message labels on Meeting screen
        // No Times/Locations labels on Schedule tab of Meeting Screen
        // All Left-side labels, and right-side time labels on Calendar screen
        // ALSO:
        // SubHeader Text Colour on Calendar Screen - NB this is same as BG colour
        // SubHeader Text Colour on Schedule tab of Meeting screen - NB this is same as BG colour
        //
        basicNoSizeLabelColor:              cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color3,
        //
        // Tick on Success Screen
        // Send Icon Color on Email Screen
        //
        invertedBkgHeaderIconColor:         cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color3Text,
        //
        // Title label and icon color in PeopleGallery on Email Screen, People Screen and Meeting Screen
        //
        basicNoSizeInvertedBkgLabelColor:   cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.Color3Text,
        //
        // Invite & Schedule tab header label on Meeting screen
        // Rooms list name label on Schedule tab on Meeting Screen
        //
        basicNoSizeWeightColorLabelColor:   cmp_Header.CMPThisTheme.defaultTextColor
}

Rules.InvariantScript:
If(cmp_Header.Flat, "", "
" )
